description: Welcome to #30 15775 Mountain View Dr — a beautifully kept 1839 sq ft townhome offering 4 bedrooms + den and 2.5 bathrooms. Built just 7 years ago, this home combines comfort and modern style with two inviting living areas and a bright kitchen featuring quartz counters, stainless appliances, and an upgraded backsplash. Enjoy mountain views from the complex’s largest rooftop deck, partially covered for year-round use. Upstairs offers natural light, a home office, and convenient laundry. Extras include smart thermostats, a double side-by-side garage, extra parking, and two storage areas.
